content.question: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on the extent to which government should be responsible for fostering green practices.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on the extent to which government should be responsible for fostering green practices.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
